variant.p: To answer these questions, the Board considered the accounting principles applying to equity transactions. The Framework states:

lq.p: Equity is the residual interest in the assets of the enterprise after deducting all of its liabilities … The amount at which equity is shown in the balance sheet is dependent upon the measurement of assets and liabilities. Normally, the aggregate amount of equity only by coincidence corresponds with the aggregate market value of the shares of the enterprise … (paragraphs 49 and 67)
